data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 9Th February 2023
data.news_body:
In terms of the provisions of Regulation 30 (read with Part A of Schedule III) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors in their Meeting held today, i.e. 9th February 2023 through video conferencing, have inter alia considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and the Nine Months ended 31st December 2022.

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the following:

i. The Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the Quarter and the Nine Months ended 31st December 2022 and Limited Review Report thereupon; and

ii. The Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and the Nine Months ended 31st December 2022 and Limited Review Report thereupon.

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 3.04 p.m. and concluded at 4.40 p.m.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Year Ended 31.03.2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the following herewith:
i. Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and the Financial Year ended on 31st March 2022, Statement of Assets and Liabilities as at 31st March 2022 and the Statement of Cash flows for the half-year ended 31st March 2022;
ii. Auditors'' Report on Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and the Financial Year ended 31st March 2022 ;
iii. Declaration pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure
Requirements) Regulations, 2015, stating that the Report of Auditors with respect to the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and the Financial Year ended 31 51 March 2022, is issued with unmodified opinion.

Please take the same on record.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the following:
i. The Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and the Nine Months ended 31st December 2021; and
ii. Limited Review Reports on Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter ended 31st December 2021.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 11Th February 2022
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith the outcome of the Board Meeting held today i.e. on 11th February 2022.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter And The Half-Year Ended 30Th September 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the following:
i. The Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and the Half-year ended 30th September 2021 along with cash flow statement for the half-year ended 30th September 2021 and the Statement of Assets and Liabilities as on that date.; and
ii. Limited Review Reports on Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter ended 30th September 2021.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June 2021
data.news_body:
The Board at its Meeting held on 11th August 2021 inter alia considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results tor the Quarter ended 30th June 2021 as enclosed:
i. The Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter ended 30th June 2021; and
ii. Limited Review Reports on Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter ended 30th June 2021.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Year Ended On 31St March 2021
data.news_body:
In accordance with Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the disclosure of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis for the Half-Year ended on 31st March, 2021.

We request you to take the above information on your record.

data.caption: Audited (Standalone & Consolidated) Financial Results For The Year Ended 31St March 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the following:

i. Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and the Financial Year ended 31st March 2021;

ii. Statement of Assets and Liabilities as at 31st March 2021;

iii. Auditors' Report on Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and the Financial Year ended 31st March 2021; and

iv. Declaration pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, stating that the Report of Auditors with respect to the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and the Financial Year ended 31st March 2021, is issued with unmodified opinion.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 28Th May 2021
data.news_body:
the Board in its meeting held today has inter alia considered and approved the following:
i. Approved the Audited Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and the FY ended 31st March 2021.
ii. Recommended a dividend of Rs. 5/- (Rupees Five Only) per equity share of Rs. 10/- each, for the FY ended 31st March 2021.

The following are enclosed:
i. Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and the FY ended 31st March 2021;
ii. Statement of Assets and Liabilities as at 31st March 2021;
iii. Auditors' Report on Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and the FY ended 31st March 2021; and
iv. Declaration stating that the Report of Auditors with respect to the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and the Financial Year ended 31st March 2021, is issued with unmodified opinion.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December, 2020
data.news_body: Enclosed are the Un-Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2020, together with the Limited Review Reports.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 12Th February, 2021
data.news_body: In terms of the provisions of Regulation 30 (read with Part A of Schedule III) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, enclosed herewith the outcome of the Board Meeting along with the necessary attachments.
